node.title: Elite Sports - Girls Football Sessions - FREE
node.content:
CALLING ALL GIRLS!

We are delighted to announce Elite will be launching our first GIRLS ONLY Development Squads from September. In preparation for this we will be offering FREE girls only sessions.

If your daughter is a keen footballer and interested in joining our Development Squads please come and join us, with details found below:

Location - Horizon International School
Time - Thursday 4-5pm
Dates - 18th, 25th April 2nd, 9th, 16th May (5 sessions)
Ages - 7-12 years old

Spaces are limited so please contact football@elitesports.ae or 04 554 5916 to register and avoid disappointment.

node.title: Elite Swim Squads at Aquatix Novice Gala
node.content:
Our swim squads recently raced at the Aquatix Novice Gala at Horizon International School. There was some fast racing on show with our swimmers gaining many personal best times and a total of 42 “top 3” places for their age group. The focus now turns to the  Hamilton First Series in June and all our swimmers will be in the pool working hard on their race skills in preparation for this.

If you wish more details on our swim squad programme then contact us on swim@elitesports.ae

node.title: Annual Registration – Savings up to 25% - Payment Plans Available - 0% interest over 10months
node.content:
The Annual Registration offer is a convenient way to register your children for the academic year with savings up to 25% per annum. You will only be required to register once for the whole year as the Elite team will re-register your child on your behalf for all future termly registrations.

Our Annual Membership provides a host of benefits alongside the consistency of a full academic year training programme to develop your child’s skills.

  • Discounted session prices
    • 60min session = AED 80 AED 100
    • 75min session = AED 88 AED 110
  • 36 week training programme
  • Package inclusive of tournament / league / gala fees
  • Register only once per year
  • Guaranteed place in your chosen session
  • Flexibility for make-up sessions missed for injury/illness
  • Flexibility to change your selected venue / day / time
  • Payment plans available

node.title: Sibling Discounts – Save 20%
node.content:
20% Sibling discount offer can be redeemed against the following programmes;

  • Football Academy
  • Football Development & Advanced Squads
  • Swimming Academy (Learn to Swim)
  • Swimming Academy (Talent ID & Squads)
  • Holiday Camps.

Please note sibling discounts cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounted offer. Sibling discount can be redeemed across multi programmes with the exception of Holiday Camps. The 20% discount offer for Holiday Camps applies ONLY to the individual camp week/s registered and cannot be used in conjunction with any other programme / offer.

For more information please contact a member of the team.

  • All prices are exclusive of VAT

node.title: Summer Multi Sports Camps
node.content:
It’s that time of year again where parents are either busy planning their Summer Holidays, or planning a busy schedule of events for their children to keep them entertained over the 8-week Summer period.

The increasingly popular option of using sports camps in Dubai for kids is where Elite Sports Academy come in during the warmest period of the year. With our fully qualified coaches, be safe in the knowledge that your child has the opportunity to stay active over the summer, try new and existing activities in a creative, positive and safe environment. 

Having been running holiday camps in Dubai for 6 years, we have multiple indoor locations available, with Elite Multi Sports Camp offering a fantastic experience for both boys and girls to learn new skills though PLAY and to continue learning other games whilst playing sports such as Football, Basketball, Cricket, Hockey, Golf and Basketball amongst many others in a FUN and friendly setting.

Our summer camps will take place at 7 venues throughout Dubai:

  • Horizon International School (Umm Al Sheif)
  • Horizon English School (Al Safa)
  • Ranches Primary School (Arabian Ranches 2)
  • Regent International School (The Greens)
  • Victory Heights Primary School (Sports City)
  • Universal American School (Dubai Festival City)
  • South View School (Remraam)

*All camps will take place in a fully air-conditioned sports hall*

Dates: 7th July - 29th August (Sunday to Thursday)

Times: 8.30am - 3.30pm (Full day) & 8.30-12 / 12-3.30 (Half day)

Prices starting from as little as AED 525 per week with multi week discount 

Activities: All children will participate in a minimum of 6 sports every day with the sports and activities changing daily to ensure diversity.

To register now, please contact camps@elitesports.ae or for more information visit our website at https://elitesports.ae/services/holiday-camps/

We look forward to seeing your child this summer.

As always, if you have any child between the age of 4 – 14 years who is interested in football or swimming coaching in Dubai, please contact us for more information.

Elite Sports Academy.

node.title: End of Season Presentation Awards
node.content:
A big thank you to all our players and parents for your hard work and support this season. It was fantastic to see so many of you attend the recent End of Season Presentation.

The attitude and development of the players has been first class throughout the year, this was displayed in a very competitive end of term tournament.

We look forward to working with the children for the remainder of the term and continuing their progress in the 2019-2020 season.

node.title: Elite Football Academy - Three new locations!
node.content:
We are pleased to announce three new Elite Football locations in Dubai extending our reach to the communities and making access to the best coaches in Dubai even easier!

We are delighted to be back at JESS Jumeirah School, we have missed the boys and girls at JESS Jumeirah over the past couple of years but are delighted to be back to see friends old and new.

JESS Jumeirah will take place on a Monday 6pm – 7pm under the new floodlights!

Raffles World Academy Football sessions will launch next week. We are extremely pleased to open the Elite Football Academy at Raffles World Academy, a new venue for Elite and a great opportunity for the pupils and Children from the surrounding area to sample our programmes and progress through the ranks via Elites fantastic development pathway. The facilities at Raffles are fantastic and will also see the Advanced & Select squads training twice per week as we ready ourselves for the new season. Please see the registration page for more details.

South View School in Remraam will play host to the Elite Football Academy for the first time. After a number of successful Futsal tournaments in term 3 the FA programme will launch over three days (Sunday, Monday & Thursday) in term 1 2019. With it’s state of the art facilities and prime location in ‘new Dubai’ we are positive that the Academy will have a fantastic impact on both the School and the surrounding community.

Elite Director Steven Whittaker commented; The aim at all of our partner venues is to ensure that every single Child at the School has an outlet to enjoy the environment we provide and progress to the next level they want to achieve. The Football Academy is a launch pad for all players to reach their true potential and progress to competitive Football. The Elite pathway is the most successful in the region when it comes to players progressing from Academy level, through Development & Advanced squads and eventually Select Squads. We have over 30 teams playing competitive Football from U7 through to U19 on a regular basis in the Elite Development & Advanced Leagues.

node.title: Elite Swimming Academy – Diving head first into two NEW locations!
node.content:
Elite are delighted to announce Regent International School in the Greens & Sunmarke School in JVT will now host Elite’s ever expanding Swim programme. We will be running both our fantastic learn to Swim programme as well as the Talent Identification sessions and Squads to enable all Children involved a clear developmental pathway to improve their ability levels and to work towards access to the Swim Squads and competitive Swim meets / galas.

Elite Director Richard Chapman commented; We are delighted to launch the Swim programme at Regent & Sunmarke. We already have a fantastic relationship with both Schools through the Football Academy and Holiday Camps, as such the addition of the Swim programme will enable Elite to guide the Children through all aspects of their sporting life

node.title: We've Been Nominated For Best Fitness Organisation by Time Out Dubai!
node.content:
Time Out Dubai continuously recognizing our hard work and passion is such a great pleasure for the whole Elite team. We truly appreciate being one of the nominees for the Best Fitness Organization. This always makes us realize how our service quality must constantly improve for the betterment of our players.

We have been ‘Highly Commended’ for the past 3 years, and hoping this time would be our year.

Nonetheless, we are very grateful for the acknowledgement we receive from Time Out Dubai and we will continue to strive to do better, to nurture, develop and grow.

"We are delighted to have our hard work recognized by the Time Out Dubai team. It's an indication that we are doing things right and all credit goes to our amazing staff, kids and of course the parents. "

Richard Chapman - Managing Partner

node.title: How to select the Best Football Academy in Dubai For Your Child?
node.content:
When it comes to selecting the right Football Academy in Dubai for your child there are a number of things that you must consider as a parent.

We've surveyed our parents and these were the top 5 factors which came up in the decision making process.

  1. Location - How close is the location to where you live?
  2. Company - Does the company have a good reputation in the market?
  3. Qualifications - Are the coaches fully qualified?
  4. Price Point - Does the price match my budget?
  5. Age Groups - Does the company cater for my child/children's age?

Elite Football Academy Dubai offers young players the opportunity to train at state of the art facilities with the most highly respected coaches in Dubai.

The sessions provide each player a platform to develop their skills, understanding and confidence whilst enjoying the energetic, fun approach of the coaching team. The sessions focus on educating the players technically and tactically whilst also ensuring they understand the importance of leadership, team cohesion and sportsmanship.

Register Now

node.title: Summer Camp registrations still open
node.content:
What a great first six weeks of the summer holidays that’s been so far. We have loved working with so many fantastic young sports boys and girls throughout. If you are yet to attend one of our many convenient locations in Dubai don’t panic, there is still time. Camps will continue until 29th August and with Dubai’s best sports camp running in 8 locations you are never far away.

With a wide range of sporting activities, the camp is perfect for all ages and ability levels. Whether your child is a budding Lionel Messi or Serena Williams or yet to find their chosen sport they’ll love every day the spend at our holiday camps. node.title: NEW SEASON, NEW KIT, NEW VENUES… SAME GREAT COACHING!!!
node.content:
It is mid-September and we are all coming off the back of the summer holiday break, children are back to school, schedules are being finalised, and more importantly, Elite Sports Academy Dubai have kicked off the 2019/20 season across our many venues in Dubai.

Despite the late summer temperatures, we have a wide range of indoor and outdoor sessions available, and it has been great to see a vast number of returning players, as well as lots of new faces who we are welcoming to the Academy. As one of the leading Football Academies in the UAE for kids, we are continually growing our programme, we have added more experience to our ever-growing team of coaches, with a brand-new syllabus of sessions newly launched, being implemented across our NEW range of football pitches in Dubai, sure to be a short journey from your residence.

As ever, Elite Sports Academy aim to increase participation within football coaching in the UAE, focusing on both boy and girls, both recreationally and competitively. Elite Sports Academy is committed to encouraging children between the ages of 4 - 18 to continue to Nurture, Develop & Grow as a footballer, in an environment in which they can flourish with their friends and peers on the football pitch.

As the weather continues to cool, we cannot wait to welcome more and more children into our sessions. Keep an eye on our social pages for updates as to how the term is going, and see the children in their new kits and accompanying goodie bags, new this season.

If you would like to enroll your sports superstar in one of our many football sessions in Dubai, please register via football@elitesports.ae NOW or speak to one of our team in the office on 04 554 5916.

Elite Sports Academy.

node.title: Elite Football Academy U18 team join their first Adult league!
node.content:
We had the pleasure to see our U18 football squad taking part in the Dubai Amateur Football League this week.

As a 1st experience the boys performed extremely well and the feedback from the opposition players and officials was fantastic. The boys played some fantastic Football (See the goal below – What a team goal!!)  

First Match was against Dubai FC Vets. The boys managed to score a goal early in the match and stood up to a very experienced football team. 1-0 was the final score to Elite. Technically, game 1 was a very good introduction to the Adults competitive side of the game.

Game 2. Was a joy to watch. Elite managed to score 5 goals and played some really good football. Ethan from our U16 was the heart of a great performance.

The Elite Coaching staff were pleased with the opposition and the referees coming to the boys at the end encouraging them and wishing them a great season.

node.title: West Ham Foundation Development Pathway
node.content:
Elite Sports Academy (UAE) are delighted to announce their partnership with the West Ham United Foundation. The newly launched partnership aims to introduce football players in the Middle East to the highest level of coaching via regular coaching clinics facilitated by the West Ham Foundation coaches.

The West Ham United Foundation run over 30 projects for members of the community across east London and Essex. By using the power of the West Ham United brand, they reach almost 50,000 people each year to help unite the community, respond to local need and provide an environment where all can thrive.

West Ham United will deliver bespoke football schemes for Elite Sport where the service will aim to promote Coach Education and Player Pathways through delivery of innovative and progressive football programmes.

The programmes will aim to provide regular opportunities for participants to train with the West Ham United Foundation coaches both in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) and United Kingdom. In addition, the partnership provides the opportunity for players based in UAE to visit London to attend the Foundation’s projects as well as playing regular fixtures against West Ham United Foundation’s teams.

The ultimate goal of the initiative is to develop the students both on and off the field using the ‘West Ham Way’ philosophy as well as promoting the history and traditions of West Ham United in the Middle East. One of the most exciting elements of the partnership is that together we have created a pathway for UAE based players to be regularly monitored by the Foundation coaches increasing the possibility of an Elite/West Ham United participant progressing into the professional game.

The Foundation provides top class FA qualified coaches alongside Elite’s outstanding annual coaching scheme, creating a first of its kind, unrivalled programme in the Middle East.

A club steeped in history and tradition, West Ham United have produced players such as World Cup-winning captain Bobby Moore, Sir Geoff Hurst, Frank Lampard, Rio Ferdinand, Joe Cole, Mark Noble and Declan Rice have all come through the Hammers’ ranks, with the east London club providing an inspirational setting whilst continuing their search for the next young stars of the future.

Steven Whittaker & Richard Chapman, Managing Directors at Elite Sports Academy, said: “We are delighted to be partnering with West Ham United Foundation and we are really looking forward to building a fantastic, revered programme that will hopefully lead to the UAE’s most talented players following a developmental pathway from the Elite/West Ham United Foundation programme all the way to the first team”

Ross Williams, Programme Development Manager at the Foundation, explained that the new partnership is a great step into the Middle East for the Foundation: “I am delighted that the West Ham United Foundation have been able to develop a strategic long-term partnership with Elite Sports. We are excited about the impact this will have on participants involved across the UK and UAE, as well as helping us to raise the profile of the charitable work that the Foundation offers.

“Crucially, this collaboration will enable the Foundation to share our vision for youth development with young people across UAE, whilst also supporting Elite Sports with their Player Pathway.”

Enquire now by visiting https://elitesports.ae/holiday-camps/west-ham-foundation-open-day/

Follow us on our social media accounts for more updates: https://www.facebook.com/elitefcdubai/ and @elitesportsacademyfc on Instagram.

node.title: Elite Select Squad Coaches Meet John Terry
node.content:
Elite Select Squad coaches Nesha and Conor had the pleasure of meeting former England and Chelsea Captain John Terry while attending the Dubai Sports Council Academy League in Sports City. The pair discussed everything from the league fixtures for their Elite squads to England’s convincing win the previous evening against Montenegro in their European Championships qualifier. Coach Conor was fortunate enough to have the multiple Premier League and Champions League winner sign his own match worn England Jersey from when he represented England’s National Amateur team in the UEFA Region’s Cup.  



#eliteselectsquad #JohnTerry #EnglandandChelseaCaptain #DubaiSportsCouncil #AcademyLeague #sports #league #fixtures #coach #football #premierleague #championsleague #sport

node.title: Elite Sports Academy introduce Girls Development Football Squads in Dubai
node.content:
Last week saw the start of Elite Sports Academy’s GIRLS ONLY Development Football Squad Sessions at Horizon International School. As one of the leading Football Academies in the UAE for kids, and with the influx of girls joining our academy in the past 6 months, we have launched the Development Squads for solely girls with the view for them to play competitive fixtures against other Football Academies in Dubai from September 2019.

As ever, Elite Sports Academy aim to increase participation within football coaching in the UAE, with our current target, to boost the participation of girls playing football, both recreationally and competitively. As one of the largest growing sports worldwide, Elite Sports Academy is committed to encouraging girls to continue to develop their football skills in an environment in which they can flourish with their friends and peers on the football pitch.

Following a great turnout for the first session last week, with a passionate and enthusiastic group in attendance, we aim to continue to grow the squads, currently available for ALL girls aged between 7 – 12 years. The sessions are currently running at the times/location below: –

  • Dates – Thursday 25th April – Thursday 16th May
  • Time – 4.00 – 5.00pm
  • Location – Horizon International School

If you would like to join for the next 4 weeks, completely FREE OF CHARGE, please register via football@elitesports.ae NOW!

We look forward to welcoming the girls of Dubai to our football sessions in the coming weeks.

As always, if you have any child between the age of 4 – 14 years who is interested in football coaching in Dubai, please contact us for more information.

Elite Sports Academy.

node.title: Elite Sports Facility Rentals are now open for booking
node.content:
Elite Sports facility rentals offer state of the art artificial and grass football pitches in Dubai, with areas including Jumeirah, Safa and Remraan. The rental pitches available range from 5 a side all the way through to 11 a side pitches. With the summer gone and the temperature sitting pleasant, why not rent one of our state-of-the-art football pitches for social football matches or even to use as team training facilities. Ranging from individuals, companies and teams renting our football pitches out, we are flexible in helping the customer out to achieve an enjoyable experience.

We have been able to offer a wide range of groups, including sports teams (Football & Rugby etc.), social groups, businesses, hotels and party groups to name just a few, find their ideal solution. Most lately, we hosted a Dubai Supporters Club Football Cup for fans of global football teams, who competed for the bragging rights to be Dubai’s best Supporters Club on the pitch.

From booking slots, available 7 days a week at 3 different locations at amazingly affordable prices we believe that bringing people together through sport helps develop social skills, activity levels and a feeling of achievement.

With football grounds in Dubai for rent at an all-time premium, now is a great time to book your pitch with Dubai’s leading sports academy, Elite Sports Academy.

For more information regarding booking your facility rental with us, please contact our facilities coordinator Andy on the following details:

andrew@elitesports.ae                                      What’s App or Call: 0585531886

To get more details in each of our venue’s pitch, visit https://elitesports.ae/services/facility-rentals/

You may also follow us in our social media accounts: https://www.facebook.com/elitefcdubai/ and @elitesportsacademyfc on Instagram, for more news and updates about our facility rentals.

We look forward to welcoming you to one of our venues in the very near future.

node.title: Kuur and Elite Sports Partnership
node.content:
Elite Sports Academy is delighted to announce an exciting new partnership with KUUR rehabilitation, one of the leading physiotherapy and rehabilitation clinics in Dubai. KUUR are specialists in their field and their approach to physiotherapy is highly individual, creating a unique treatment program for every patient while delivering results in the shortest possible time. KUUR also enable patients through training and education to stay pain free, increase sports performance and quality of life.

Post graduate specialization of each of their physiotherapists allows them to treat a wide variety of problems such as sports injuries, acute and chronic conditions, women’s health and ergonomics. Some of the treatments offered are manual therapy, manipulation, acupuncture or dry needling, Kinesio taping, exercise therapy, bio-mechanical analysis, cupping, shock wave, electrotherapy, laser or ultrasound.

The team at Kuur has a wealth of knowledge and experience in treating the type of conditions that children and adolescents who play regular sport suffer from.

We would like to introduce KUUR as our partner of choice for all of your physiotherapy and rehabilitation needs.

We hope this partnership benefits your family and in particular our young sports stars!

node.title: Elite Advanced League – End of Season 1
node.content:
Last Thursday saw the conclusion of the Elite Advanced League Season 1 for the u8s, u10s, u12s & u14s. The Elite Advanced League Season 1 Cup was the final fixtures of the season for all involved. The cup was a chance for all teams showcase their talent and a fantastic opportunity for all to finish the season with some silverware.

Each tournament was played in a fair and competitive manner and was a fantastic representation of the league. The level of play, attitude & effort shown by all players involved was of the highest calibre.

Fantastic goals, brilliant passing moves and strong defending was all on display, as result the cup was a brilliant way to tie up season 1. Congratulations to all winning teams and individual award winners on their much-deserved awards. With season 2 starting on the 23rd January excitement is high and everyone is looking forward to a successful season.

#EAL #EliteAdvancedLeague #advanced #league #goals #team #football #footballleague #matches #sports #elite #beelite #elitesports


For more photos and videos you may visit our Facebook or Instagram pages.

node.title: Introducing Elite Live Coaching Sessions on Facebook
node.content:
Facebook Live Football Coaching Sessions with Elite Sports Academy!

Elite Sports Academy are delighted to bring to you our Online Coaching Series. Come and join us for our LIVE educational coaching videos each week with your favourite coaches, and keep on top of your game in readiness for when our coaching sessions return at your favourite venues.

Participate, engage and interact with our team of coaches during the live sessions, and ask any questions you may have…

• FREE to all Elite members, our partner schools and friends!
• Physical activities to reduce your Child’s ever-increasing boredom levels!
• Join us LIVE on Facebook: -
⏰ 4.00pm UAE time
? Every Sunday / Tuesday / Thursday
?‍♂️ 30 minute ‘ACTIVE’ sessions with your favourite coaches!
⚽️ All you need is a ball!
? Can take part in either your apartment or garden
? Activities will be interactive and FUN and will be the perfect medicine after a day of online learning!

• Also, join us every Monday & Wednesday when we will be posting our series of educational activities, challenges, quizzes & competitions to keep your child occupied with Football themed activities!

Don’t forget to like our Facebook page and share and videos of your children in action for our highlight reels.

NUTURE / DEVELOP / GROW


Watch our very first Live Coaching Session on Facebook here:


Or you may visit our Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/elitefcdubai/  for more updates and information regarding our Live Coaching Sessions.

node.title: Elite Sports Educational Tasks
node.content:
? Elite Sports Educational Task 1

As part of our online learning series, we are delighted to post our Fantasy Football Maths Manager.

Managers of football teams have a difficult job when it comes to picking their starting 11 and managing a budget... Using your mathematics skills, carefully select your Fantasy Football XI with just 90million to spend, without going over your budget.

Can you create the strongest team?

We look forward to seeing your teams posted below.

*Remember to join us at 4.00pm every week day for our live session (Sunday/Tuesday/Thursday) & Educational tasks (Monday/Wednesday)*

Visit our Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/elitefcdubai/  for more Educational Tasks to keep your child's mind active during this time of uncertainty.

node.title: LIVE NOW! – West Ham United Foundation Activity Packs
node.content:
We would like to introduce you to our free online educational activities in partnership with our Premier League partners the West Ham Utd Foundation!

In conjunction with our live online sessions, we have been setting Educational Challenges twice a week, in the hope to keep the children’s minds actively engaged also. We are delighted to now extend to you an extensive E-Learning Activity Packs/Syllabus from the West Ham United Foundation, for our players to work through over the weekend/next week.

During this very difficult time both socially and economically for our valued members, we feel it is imperative we keep our players engaged with FREE activities. We hope both the West Ham activity packs, in addition to the Facebook Live Coaching Sessions 3 days a week, keep your young Football players occupied and engaged.

node.title: Robert Snodgrass Question + Answer
node.content:
After a few days of mystery, we are delighted to bring to you our first Q+A session with former Leeds United, Norwich City, Hull City and current West Ham United winger, Robert Snodgrass.

Snoddy was kind enough to give up an hour of his time to speak to Coach Matt and Coach Bryan, and answered some selected questions from some of our Academy players, as well as our own.

Despite the length of the video, this is a fantastic insight into professional football, so sit down, make some notes and take on board some fantastic advice from the ex-Scottish International player.

It would be great to hear your responses to some of the answers Snoddy gave, so pop them into the comments box below.

We hope to bring you more videos like this in the coming weeks.

Enjoy!


You may also watch the video here: https://www.facebook.com/watch/?v=686960988798128

node.title: Elite Football Coaching Sessions are Back
node.content:
FOOTBALL SESSIONS ARE BACK!

Following the announcements by the UAE Government, Dubai Sports Council & Health Authority to allow sport to resume, we are delighted to announce the return of our coaching sessions for children AGED 12 YEARS AND ABOVE.


The sessions will allow us to recommence Term 2 and to conclude the postponed sessions, adhering to strict SAFETY PRECAUTIONS.

  • In-line with Government guidelines
  • From: Sunday 31st May 2020
  • Times: Sessions will run from 4.00pm onwards


SAFETY PRECAUTIONS

  • Social distancing - 2M spaces between participants
  • Max. 4 players per section
  • Masks to be worn
  • Temperature tests for all participants
  • Sanitization of footballs after use


TRAINING

  • All sessions and drills have been designed to ensure the 2M distance guidelines are adhered to at all times
  • Technical training to include fundamental areas, including Ball Mastery, Passing, Dribbling and Shooting
  • Sessions will include competitions and challenges to enhance football development
  • Continual feedback from the coach, with challenges to be set to complete at home
  • Fitness related activities to keep players sharp


LOCATIONS

  • Arabian Ranches Golf Club (Arabian Ranches 1)
  • Safa Park 1 (Al Safa)


Please contact us on the link below for available session times.

All registrations MUST BE MADE IN ADVANCE to ensure we do not exceed maximum numbers.


Register NOW by sending an email to football@elitesports.ae

node.title: Football Coaching Sessions ARE BACK!
node.content:
It has been a long 3 months since the COVID-19 pandemic affected us all here in Dubai. As a sports academy, the restrictions halted ALL of our Football and Swimming coaching sessions, and we have of course, all been restricted to our homes for a prolonged period of time, experiencing a new way of living.


Restrictions are now easing, with restaurants and business re-opening, beaches and swimming pools starting to gradually open, and for more specifically for us at Elite Sports Academy, sport is able to be played, with coaching sessions able to resume. We have been busy at work behind the scenes planning for the new academic year in September, but this welcomed news allowed us to get back on the coaching pitch and deliver football coaching sessions from Sunday 31st May 2020.


Last week saw the resumption of Elite Sports Academy’s Football Coaching Sessions for children AGED 12 YEARS AND ABOVE. In line with Government directives and Dubai Sports Council approval, we have recommenced our coaching sessions at Arabian Ranches Golf Club and United Pro Sports Football Centre, and we have had a great response from our players. Take a look at what we have been up to through this short video.


As one of the leading Football Academies in the UAE for kids, we have taken all necessary precautions to ensure children’s safety during sessions, as such the following rules / procedures will be in place at ALL sessions.

  • Social distancing - 2M spaces between participants 
  • A maximum of 4 participants per section
  • Masks to be worn by all participants, parents and staff (Can be lowered during strenuous exercise)
  • Sanitizer will also be provided at the venues
  • Temperature checks for all participants/coaches
  • Sanitization of equipment before and after use


Our football coaching at this time, despite smaller groups, has included all elements of our regular sessions, including ball mastery, passing & combination play, shooting & finishing, SAQ activities and Fitness based drills.


We are in constant communication with the Sports Council regarding updates to the regulations, and hope to be able to offer holiday sports camps in Dubai when the summer period arrives, and with swimming pools anticipated to re-open this week, our Swimming coaching sessions for children also.


Until then, if your child is 12 years old or above, and would like to resume football training sessions in Dubai, please register via football@elitesports.ae NOW!


You can also see what we have bene up to over the lockdown period for children of all ages via our Facebook and Instagram pages, @elitesportsacademydubai (Elite Sports Academy Dubai)


Elite Sports Academy.

node.title: Football & Multi-Sports Camps Launch
node.content:
Elite Sports Academy are delighted to announce our summer programme of Holiday Camps, commencing Monday 6th July 2020.


Football camp locations:

  • JESS Arabian Ranches - Starting Monday 6th July
  • Horizon International School – Starting Tuesday 7th July

 

Multi-Sport locations:

  • JESS Arabian Ranches – Starting Monday 6th July
  • JESS Jumeirah – Starting Monday 6th July
  • Horizon English School – Starting Tuesday 7th July
  • Regent International School – Starting Tuesday 7th July


Details:

  • 8.30am – 3.30pm
  • Sunday – Thursday
  • All activities indoor
  • Children in School Grade / Year 1 and above


Safety guidelines in place:

  • Physical distancing and face masks on arrival and departure
  • Limited group sizes
  • Temperature checks on arrival and at regular intervals
  • Hand sanitization between each activity
  • Declaration forms from each participant
  • Daily sterilization of area and equipment
  • Hygiene officer on site


Pricing:

  • AED 840 Full week
  • 20% Sibling discount available


Registration:

  • Pre-registration and payment strictly required (walk-in customers won’t be accepted)
  • Submission of the COVID-19 Declaration form is required to secure place (limited spaces available due to strict safety guidelines)


For more information and to register, visit the camps section on the website. - https://elitesports.ae/services/holiday-camps-dubai

node.title: It’s good to be back (In the Schools!)
node.content:
It’s been a long time coming but finally we got back to action in the School facilities! With the pitch at JESS Ranches well-rested, the playing surface was immaculate, and with the sun shining it felt more like FA Cup final day!

Players and coaches were delighted to back in the Schools, with access to some of the best facilities you will find anywhere in the world. It was great to see so many familiar faces back on the pitch enjoying their Football.

After waiting so patiently for a return to the Sport we love we couldn’t have had a more fitting environment.

node.content:
Well, it’s fair to say that 2020 has been a very different year so far to what we all expected. With COVID-19 halting the vast majority of the end of the season, we want to remember the best parts of what 2019/2020 had for Elite Sports Academy and our Development/Advanced Football Squad Players, and celebrate the successes on and off the field.

With that in mind, as we are unfortunately able to bring all our players and parents together as in usual fashion, we are delighted to bring you our END OF SEASON AWARDS PRESENTATION.

During the presentation, we will take a look at: -

 2019/2020 Season Review
 Messages from our Squad Venues
 Development and Advanced Squads Coaches & Players of the Year Awards
 A word from our Directors
⚽️ Season Montage

We want to praise EVERY player for their continued hard work this season, and wish our congratulations to our awards winners. To our parents, we want to thank you for your continued support, without you, none of what we do would be possible. We cannot wait to kick off the 2020/2021 season in September and picking up where we left off this season ⚽️⚽️⚽️

node.title: October Half Term Camp - Registration is now open
node.content:
Elite Sports Academy are delighted to confirm our ever popular holiday camp programmes will be returning for October half term.


With a wide range of sporting activities, the camp is perfect for all ages and ability levels. Whether your child is a budding Lionel Messi or Serena Williams or yet to find their chosen sport they’ll love every day the spend at our holiday camps. While improving a range of sporting aspect daily the Elite Summer Sports Camps don’t just stop there, our team of professional coaches will prepare them for the new school year in more ways than one:

node.title: Elite Resumes Football Training & Swimming Classes in Dubai with COVID Safety Measures
node.content:
It seems a lifetime ago that we were restricted to our homes, on lockdown and wondering when life would return to normal. A whole new way of learning for children, a new way of working for adults, and a new way of life seemed to have been born.

Fast forward 6 months, and we find ourselves in this ‘new normal’, but at Elite Sports Academy, we are trying to keep everything as normal as possible for your children, allowing them to learn and improve their football and swimming skills, just as they did before COVID-19 graced itself on the world.

Of course, our paramount consideration nowadays is the safety of your children, and every player who is part of an Elite Sport Session. So just what are the leading sports academy in Dubai doing to keep your children safe?

First and foremost, we appreciate that there are many people still concerned about the current state of play in the country surround COVID cases. Many children have not returned to school, and are still on extended learning, but Elite Sport are certainly on hand to allow your children to continue to get their weekly fix of football sessions, swimming lessons and general physical fitness sessions by keeping active in one of our many sessions across Dubai.

The safety procedures in place all coincide with the Dubai Sports Council (DSC) and Dubai Health Authority (DHA) guidelines that have been set out to us, and we have continually adapted to changing procedures since the safe return to sport for our players before the summer holiday camps commenced. At present, we are ensuring that: -

  • Temperature checks upon arrival to sessions
  • Masks to be worn before, during and after ALL sessions (can be lowered during sessions)
  • Sanitizing of hands upon entry to the venue
  • Social Distancing throughout sessions
  • Ratios in line with Dubai Sports Council (Max. 10 children per coach)
  • Sanitizing of equipment after each session
  • COVID declaration Forms required in order for children to take part in sessions
  • Parents to drop and collect at start and end of sessions. On the most part, parents not allowed on site to avoid congregation and ensure social distancing is adhered to.

At Elite Sports Academy, our primary objective is to keep our sports superstar’s safe, and able to enjoy the sports they love.

In time, as and when restrictions ease, we will continually update our parents with such changes, but for now, we thank everyone for their continued support during the current time, and allowing your children to return to their sessions and continue to flourish once again on the football field or in the swimming pool.

If you would like to get your child involved in either our Football Academy or Swimming Academy in Dubai, Elite Sports Academy is the perfect place for you – contact info@elitesports.ae NOW!


Nurture. Develop. Grow.

node.title: The Elite Leagues are BACK!!
node.content:
Both the Elite Advanced and the Elite Development league have returned. The league this year will be residing at Jess Arabian Ranches School, one of the outstanding football facilities in Dubai. Thursday nights Advanced League takes place under the floodlights while the Development League takes place Friday morning.


We are delighted to announce that the league has been a great success to date with both returning and new academies participating in the 7aside league format (under government guidelines). It is our pleasure to be able to provide players from all over Dubai once again with competitive football and look forward to seeing the league go from strength to strength. Matches have been very competitive and the standard and speed of play has been of a immensely high quality.


If you would like to see results and league tables from our advanced league please head over to the “Leagues” tab on our website and follow us on Instagram and Facebook.

node.title: Elite Football Leagues in Dubai – Elite Advanced and Development Leagues successful 6th edition
node.content:
Starting as one of the first of its kind in the region, the Elite DEVELOPMENT league in the UAE offers the opportunity for children who are developing their football skills and still learning the game to play competitive football against other football academies. Through our Development League Football academies for kids in Dubai now have the opportunity to play in competitive leagues where the primary purpose is player development, improving game understanding and reducing the importance of winning by creating an opportunity to make mistakes and correct them with direct feedback from both the head coach and the referee. The league operates across 8 different age categories, with over 50 participating teams, from 12 different private and professional football academies. We are proud to say that the Elite Development League on Friday mornings have positively affected and helped improve hundreds of players across the region over the last 3 years whilst introducing many to the rules and format of competitive football. Still to this day it remains a very successful and positive developmental pathway on Friday morning at the fantastic facilities of JESS Arabian Ranches. Since September 2020 the Elite Development league accommodates some of the very best youth football academies for kids in Dubai age U13-U16s.


After the great success of the Elite Development league, began the Elite Advanced League for a more competitive and challenging environment for youth football academies and players in the UAE. More than 14 different kids football academies in Dubai have participated over the past 5 seasons and this year we have more than 10 different football academies for kids that are participating in the Elite Advanced League from ages U13-U18. With the competition now higher than ever, Thursday night is a fantastic opportunity for the strongest teams and players to battle for the top prize. The Elite Advanced League is the place to be when it comes to exciting games and great football skills with players from some of the best football academies for kids in Dubai on show competing to finish in 1st place.


With the current COVID-19 restrictions every changing, we are delighted to announce the resumption of U8-U12 age league category for all football academies for kids in Dubai. The leagues for our younger age groups will start within the next few weeks and we offer the invitation to all participating privates and professional football academies interested in the best kids advanced and development football leagues in Dubai to join us for another season of amazing youth football in the UAE.

node.title: COVID Safety during sessions
node.content:
Safety is absolutely paramount to us at Elite Sports Academy and we want to ensure that your children can enjoy their favourite activities during the ongoing pandemic.


Whilst we understand your concerns as a parent, we want to remind you of the strict safety procedures we have in place at all sessions for our players: -


  • Temperate checks on arrival for all staff and participants – anyone with a temperate above 37.5c will not be allowed entry
  • Limited number of children : coach ratio, in line with Dubai Sports Council
  • Masks to be worn by all participants (can be lowered during strenuous exercise), parents, and staff
  • Sanitizing before every session
  • At most venues, parents/spectators are NOT allowed on site and must collect at the end of the session
  • Distancing 2m at all times (from parents, colleagues and children)
  • Sanitization of equipment daily
  • COVID Declaration Forms


We love what we do, and we are delighted, as always, to be able to coach your children in a safe and fun environment.

node.title: January Blog 2021 – GYS Spring Cup and Elite Competitions
node.content:
A new year and a new youth football tournament to get excited about. Elite Sports Academy are delighted to be the Official Technical Partners of the upcoming GYS Spring Cup. Taking place in February in Dubai Sports City, the competition looks set to be a fantastic opportunity for all selected children to compete with other Professional and Private football academies in Dubai and the UAE. Set within the World Class facilities of The Football Centre in Dubai Sports City, Elite Sports Academy are thrilled to be partnered to such a prestigious event and look forward to a brilliant weekend of football in February 2021.


With youth football in Dubai being as competitive as it is, we are delighted to also be competing in the Youth Football League in Season 2. Our Under 12 and Under 16 Select squads will compete with other Youth football academies and we wish all our players the very best of luck this season. Additionally, our Girls Select squad will begin their girls league this weekend at Formarke School. This will be the first competitive league game for our girls select squad who have been training and playing friendlies since September last year. Best of Luck Girls.


The Elite Advanced League and Elite Development League resumed last weekend, with over 80 teams competing and more than 1000 children and coaches in attendance over the weekend. Taking place at the excellent venue of JESS Arabian Ranches, we saw amazing football, competitive as always and played in a fantastic spirit. We thank all our players, coaching team and members for creating a wonderful experience for all participants.


With the new year now well underway, football sessions in Dubai have resumed across our multitude of locations. It continues to bring us an incredible feeling to see our children continue to deal with all that the current pandemic throws at them, and to continue to play the sport we all love so much. With health and safety measure still in place throughout our sessions, we thank our children and families for their continued support and understanding at what has been the most challenging 12 months in all our lives.


Please make sure to follow Elite on Facebook and Instagram for regular updates and content at elitesportsacademydubai on both platforms as well as our website www.elitesports.ae for further information regarding all our football sessions, times and locations.

node.title: Elite Football League Dubai
node.content:
The Elite Youth Football League Dubai has enjoyed a great start to Season 1 (2020/21). We have had over 120 different teams competing in bi-weekly fixtures at Jess Arabian Ranches School, ages ranging from U7s up to U18s. We provided numerous Football Academies in Dubai with the opportunity to play competitive football fixtures. After a long break in 2020, both players and coaches alike embraced the vibrant atmosphere at both the Elite Advanced League (Thursday evening)and the Elite Development League (Friday morning).

As well as providing players with competitive football, The Elite Academy Football League in Dubai creates professional content which displays the high level of play which is shown at the Elite Leagues. We provide customers with a weekly highlight video which can be found on the Elite Sports Academy YouTube channel, as well as a Team Of The Week post on our Instagram page. Both give our parents/customers the chance to keep up to date with the Elite Leagues, either watching your child on our highlights footage or possibly seeing them feature in the Team Of The Week.

With season 2 just around the corner, we are excited to invite all other Football Academies in Dubai to join. Combing our outstanding facilities, vibrant atmosphere, and high level of football, come and be part of the most professional Youth Academy League in Dubai.

Elite Sports Academies

  • Football Academy in Dubai
  • Swimming Academy in Dubai
  • Holiday Camps in Dubai
  • Rental Facilities in Dubai
  • Sports Academy in Dubai

node.title: ACADEMY LEAGUE – SEASON 2 REGISTRATION
node.content:
ACADEMY LEAGUE – SEASON 2 REGISTRATION


In January, we launched Season 1 of our inaugural Academy League, for players aged 6 years and above who play in our Academy Football sessions.


The Academy League allows our players to compete in regular competitive football games against other Elite Sports players, divided into 6 teams, each representing a professional football team from around the world. The simple reason for the league is to allow our players to develop their match understanding and football ability in a fun, whilst competitive environment, being coached in game by one of our team of coaches throughout each game.


We have seen so much more development from the players who competed in Season 1, and I cannot stress the importance and benefit this will be to your child’s football development. Despite the current pandemic, we are also proud to inform you that parents are allowed to stay and watch the games, so can see the improvement your children are making, as well as support them in each of their 5 games.


We are delighted to announce that Season 2 Registration is NOW OPEN, and places can be secured by following the link below (your Term 3 session registration can be completed separately).


The new season will run over 5 consecutive weeks (bar the National Holiday), as to beat the heat, and the scheduled game weeks are as follows: -


Location: 

  • Horizon English School (Al Safa) - Map


Dates:

  • Week 1 – Friday 16th April 2021
  • Week 2 – Friday 23rd April 2021
  • Week 3 - Friday 30th April 2021
  • Week 4 – Friday 7th May 2021
  • National Holiday – Friday 14th May 2021
  • Week 5 – Friday 21st May 2021


Times:

  • 8.00 – 9.00am (Ages 6/7/8)
  • 9.00 – 10.00am (Ages 9+)


Pre-Registration and payment to secure your child’s place is STRICLY REQUIRED and will be offered on a first come first served basis.

 

Academy Football League Registration Link - https://secure.telr.com/gateway/ql/EliteSportsAcademy_177575.html (AED 420)


We cannot wait to kick off season 2 in a few weeks’ time and look forward to seeing lots of new players compete – IN SHORT, YOUR CHILDREN NEED THIS ☺


We also hope your children can make the End of Term Academy Football Tournament on Friday 26th March.

node.title: TERM 3 FOOTBALL & SWIMMING COMMENCE
node.content:
Term 3 Football & Swimming Commence


We are delighted to have kicked off the third and final term of the academic year, with our Football and Swimming Activities at all venues across Dubai.


The final term will consist of 14 sessions (including the end of Term Football Tournament / Swimming Gala) and sessions the final session of the term will be on Thursday 8th July 2021. *No further sessions will run after this point, as we enter the summer holiday period, and the commencement of our Holiday Camps.


Our whole range of services have commenced, including: -


  • Mini Kickers Football
  • Football Academy Sessions
  • Development & Advanced Football Squads
  • Baby & Toddler Swimming
  • Learn to Swim Sessions
  • Swimming Squads


To register for a FREE TRIAL SESSION or SWIMMING ASSESSMENT, you can follow our easy to use registration pages at the top of the page, by selecting your desired venue and selecting your chosen activity.


A vast majority of sessions are taking place later than usual, and will remain outdoors, will a few of our sessions moving indoors in the coming weeks. You can view our full schedule of sessions via the website.


We look forward to working with your children this term.

node.title: END OF TERM 3 FOOTBALL TOURNAMENT
node.content:
End of Term Football Tournament


We are delighted to announce details of our End-of-term Football Tournament, for our Academy Football players (NOT Advanced & Development players)


The tournament will see children from all Elite venues participate in matches, giving the children the opportunity to develop the skills they have learned in their coaching sessions in a competitive and fun environment, and to round off the season with a bang.


Date:


  • Saturday 3rd July 2021


Location:


  • JESS Arabian Ranches (Indoor Sports Centre) - Map


Tournament times:

 

  • 8.00 – 9.15am (Ages 4 – 5)
  • 9.15 – 10.30am (Ages 6 – 7)
  • 10.30 – 11.45am (Ages 8 – 14)


*Each Tournament will last around 60 minutes with the presentation to follow.


Price:


  • No payment will be required for all footballers attending the Elite Academy sessions in Term 3.
  • Confirmation email will be sent in the week leading up to the tournament with further details.


COVID Restrictions:


  • REGISTRATION IN ADVANCE IS STRICTLY REQUIRED 
  • Temperate checks on arrival for all staff and participants – anyone with a temperate above 37.5c will not be allowed entry
  • Please arrive 15 minutes prior to the tournament start time to avoid congregating/waiting
  • Footballers to be dropped and collected. Please note parents ARE NOT allowed on site
  • Masks to be worn by all participants (can be removed during strenuous exercise) and staff
  • Participants should bring their own water and are encouraged to bring their own sanitizer gel


Registration:


Registration response is compulsory and must be confirmed before Tuesday 29th June 2021.


Please confirm your attendance by providing the following information to emman@elitesports.ae : -


  • Childs name
  • Childs age
  • Current session attending


We look forward to your entry registration to the end-of Term 3 Football Tournament on Saturday 3rd July.

node.title: ELITE SPORTS ACADEMY PRICING 2021/2022
Sample post
FINAL WEEK OF SUMMER CAMPS
node.content:
FINAL WEEK OF SUMMER CAMPS


It has been another hot summer in Dubai, but with many people having been fortunate to travel back to their home countries or on family holidays, but as the summer holidays draw to a close, Elite Sports Academy are on hand during the final week with our ever-popular Multi-Sports and Intensive Football Camps.


Running from Sunday 22nd – Thursday 26th August 2021, our fully air-conditioned camps run daily from 8.30 – 3.30pm at multiple, convenient locations across Dubai.


Our activities are designed to keep your child active during the school holidays at our state of the art facilities. Children participate within their own age group to ensure they are safe and fully challenged & the environment is always welcoming & enjoyable so your child spends their day learning new skills and making new friends.


SPACES ARE EXTREMELY LIMITED due to popular demand, and you can secure the final remaining spaces by following the booking pages at https://elitesports.ae/services/holiday-camps-dubai/registration


We look forward to closing out our camps with a bang and seeing you all there!

node.title: 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
node.content:
Elite Sports Academy are delighted to commence our 10th season/anniversary this September.


We kicked off in Dubai in 2011, and have grown to become one of Dubai’s most recognised Sports Academies, and we are so excited for our plans for the year ahead.


As part of our yearlong celebrations, first and foremost, we have some AMAZING PRIZES, to give as part of our Elite Members Raffle INCLUDING A HOLIDAY TO MAURITIUS. We have teamed up with some fantastic partners this year, who have donated some amazing prizes, and will offer our members some exciting benefits across the year.


For every Annual Registration completed by Thursday 30th September 2021, you will be entered into a draw to win some amazing prizes from some wonderful partners we have teamed up with this year.


We will be shortly announcing some of our exciting plans, as we make the 2021/2022 season, our biggest and best yet.


We are delighted to have you as part of the family this year!

node.title: Term 3 Football & Swimming Registration OPEN
node.content:
We are delighted to kick off the third and final term of the academic year, with our Football and Swimming Activities at all venues across Dubai, commencing on Monday 11th April 2022.


The final term will consist of 14 sessions (including the end of Term Football Tournament / Swimming Gala), with the final sessions of the term taking place on Friday 8th July 2022. *No further sessions will run after this point, as we enter the summer holiday period, and the commencement of our Holiday Camps, post the EID holiday.


Our whole range of services include: -


  • Mini Kickers Football
  • Football Academy Sessions
  • Development & Advanced Football Squads
  • Baby & Toddler Swimming
  • Learn to Swim Sessions
  • Swimming Squads
  • Adult Swimming


To register for a FREE TRIAL SESSION or SWIMMING ASSESSMENT, you can follow our easy to use registration pages at the top of the page, by selecting your desired venue and selecting your chosen activity.


A vast majority of sessions are taking place later than usual, and will remain outdoors, with a few of our sessions moving indoors in the coming weeks, which will be communicated by your venue coordinator in due course. In the meantime, you can view our full schedule of sessions via the schedule section of the website.


We look forward to working with your children next term and finishing the season with a bang!

A vast majority of sessions are taking place later than usual, and will remain outdoors, with a few of our sessions moving indoors in the coming weeks, which will be communicated by your venue coordinator in due course. In the meantime, you can view our full schedule of sessions via the schedule section of the website.


We look forward to working with your children next term and finishing the season with a bang!

node.title: OCTOBER HALF TERM HOLIDAY CAMPS
node.content:
We are just 1 week away from the October Half Term and our ever-popular Holiday Camp Programme.

Elite Sport will be on hand to offer active and exciting childcare provision, through our range of Multi-Sport and Football Camps, at venues across Dubai.

Elite Holiday Camps are great fun and actively engage your child in numerous sporting & sport specific activities throughout an action-packed day. Our activities are designed to keep your child active during the school holidays at our state of the art facilities. Children participate within their own age group to ensure they are safe and fully challenged & the environment is always welcoming & enjoyable so your child spends their day learning new skills and making new friends.

This October, we will be offering Multi-Sports Camps, as well as Intensive Football Camps: -

Sunday 17th – Thursday 21st October 2021

⏰ 8.30am – 3.30pm

Multiple Venues across Dubai

Ages – 4 – 14 years

For our full schedule and locations, check out our easy to follow booking pages via the HOLIDAY CAMPS tab on the right of the page to REGISTER NOW!

node.title: WINTER HOLIDAY CAMP
node.content:
Elite Sports Academy are delighted to confirm their ever-popular holiday camp programmes will be returning during the winter break.


Both our Multi Sports Holiday Camp and Intensive Football Camps are available at multiple locations across Dubai.


At our Multi-Sports Camp, 6 different sports are offered daily, where your children will be able to try their hand at their favourite activities and make some new friends in the lead up to the festive period. Our Intensive Football Camp, for children aged 7 years and above, are a fantastic supplement to the weekly Squad coaching sessions and facilitate accelerated learning through an all-day footballing environment, which is a must for any football mad children.

The tournament will see children from all Elite venues participate in matches, giving the children the opportunity to develop the skills they have learned in their coaching sessions in a competitive and fun environment, and to round off the season with a bang.


Date:


  • Sunday 27th March 2022


Location:


  • Brighton College (Al Barsha South)


Tournament times:

 

  • 8.00 – 9.30am (Ages 4 – 6)*
  • 10.00 – 11.30am (Ages 7 – 14)*

Price:


  • No payment will be required for all footballers attending the Elite Academy sessions in Term 2, and registration email has been sent to all Term 2 footballers.
  • Confirmation email will be sent in the week leading up to the tournament with further details.


REGISTRATION IN ADVANCE IS STRICTLY REQUIRED VIA THE EMAIL LINK SENT TO YOU

node.title: 2022/2023 SEASON REGISTRATION
node.content:
We are extremely excited that the 2022/2023 Season with Elite Sports Academy STARTS IN JUST 3 WEEKS!

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

We cannot wait to kick off our awesome Football and Swimming programmes across Dubai and look forward to welcoming children, both new and old.

node.title: ELITE SPORTS GYMNASTICS ACADEMY HAS ARRIVED!
node.content:
It has been years in the planning, knocked back by COVID, but we have finally commenced our newest service under the Elite Sport umbrella.


Elite Sports Gymnastics has arrived, from beginner level to advanced, for children aged 3-10 years, with sessions now running across Dubai, and the program is off to a fantastic start! Our amazing gymnasts have been training extremely hard; working not only on their gymnastics, but also their confidence. Gymnastics requires the children to vast amounts of discipline and dedication, and it’s up to our wonderful coaches to provide a fun and energetic session for our children to be part of.


Coaches Shauna and Megan, both having made the big move to Dubai, bring years of coaching experience and competitive experience with them, and are heading up our Gymnastics Academy in Dubai, inspiring the next generation of gymnasts to learn and develop their artistic skills.


With sessions well underway, we are providing gymnastics at many different venues around Dubai and soon to be Abu Dhabi. We offer both Nursery and Academy sessions, nursery placing more focus on balance and coordination with our younger aged children. This is the perfect start to your child’s gymnastics journey! This will then lead them into their Academy sessions which are hour long sessions, with a more detailed focus on routines and more complex skill acquisition.


If you are looking for a new environment for your child to start, develop or further their gymnastics, please contact us via the usual channels. We have every confidence that the Gymnastics Academy will continue to blossom in the future, coupled with the amazing feedback we have had from both parents and gymnasts, regarding our coaches and how they run the sessions.


NURTURE | DEVELOP | GROW

node.title: ELITE | WEST HAM WINTER FOOTBALL CAMP
node.content:
December saw Elite Football Academy, in partnership with West Ham United Foundation host a 3-day football camp at Brighton College football for our Elite squad footballers. With over 150 footballers in attendance, the West Ham coaches were delighted with the attitude, application and ability on display. The West Ham coaches covered numerous topics throughout the 3 days, featuring ball mastery, technical practice, and tactical analysis.


In addition to the camp, the West Ham coaching team, hosted a CPD for our Elite Football coaches, touching on delivery, session planning, individual player development, nutrition among many more. The CPD had both practical and theory elements to it and was thoroughly enjoyed by all involved.


Upon the completion of the camps for all age groups, 3 players from each group were selected to receive individual awards and certificates for their participation in the camp, with 1 winner from each day selected as the star of the camp, receiving the 2022/23 West Ham United home shirt in recognition of their efforts on the camp. Congratulations to all prize winners, and special mention to both Joshua & Troy who received the West Ham Shirts.


The camp is the latest event in partnership with West Ham United Foundation, which precedes our London 2022 trip in August where over 70 of our Elite footballers travelled to London for 7 days in the capital of London. We are already looking forward to our next trip.


For more details on the West Ham United partnership, please contact Conor at conor@elitesports.ae

node.title: ELITE SPORTS LAUNCH BRAND NEW BASKETBALL ACADEMY
node.content:
Basketball is a sport that has captured the hearts of many around the world. From the fast-paced action to the incredible athleticism, it's no wonder that so many people are drawn to the game. Now, there's a new basketball academy in Dubai, with Elite Sports Academy launching our newest sports service, aimed to help children aged 5 years and upwards learn the fundamentals of the game and develop their skills.


Elite Sports Basketball is designed to provide a safe and supportive environment for children who are interested in learning how to play basketball. We have a team of highly experienced coaches who are dedicated to teaching children the fundamentals of the game, including shooting, dribbling, passing, and defense.


One of the great things about this Elite Sports Basketball Academy is that we are open to children of all skill levels. Whether your child is a beginner or has been playing basketball for many years, we will be able to find a program that suits your child’s needs. Elite Sport offers a range of programs, including group lessons, private coaching, and camps, so you can choose the one that works best for your child.


The group lessons are designed to help children learn the fundamentals of the game in a fun and supportive environment. Children will be able to work with other kids their age and develop their skills together. Private coaching is available for children who want to focus on specific aspects of their game or who want one-on-one attention from a coach. And the camps are a great way for children to spend a week or two during the summer months, learning new skills and making new friends.


Elite Sports Basketball Academy is also equipped with state-of-the-art facilities that are designed to help children develop their skills. The facilities include indoor and outdoor courts, fully equipped, to help children learn and improve their game.


If you're looking for a way to get your child involved in basketball, then Elite Sports Basketball Academy is definitely worth checking out. With a team of experienced coaches, a range of programs to choose from, and top-notch facilities, our academy is sure to help your child develop their skills and have fun along the way.

So why not sign up your child today and see what they can achieve?


REGISTER NOW FOR YOUR FREE TRIAL SESSION!

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

We cannot wait to kick off our awesome Football, Swimming, Gymnastics & Basketball programmes across Dubai & Abu Dhabi, and look forward to welcoming children, both new and old.

 

We are delighted to introduce new venues, new kit, new coaches & a comprehensively planned & developed syllabus for the upcoming year and look forward to commencing from Wednesday 30th August 2023.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Register now for our your child’s favourite sessions and avail amazing savings with our annual membership offers.

node.title: Limited Spaces Available & Registration Still Open as the Weather Cools Down!
node.content:
Limited Spaces Available & Registration Still Open as the Weather Cools Down! 


As the Summer Sun takes a back seat and the temperatures turns cool and pleasant, make the most of the weather and come on down to our sessions across Dubai and Abu Dhabi. With spaces still available in our Football, Basketball, Swimming, and Gymnastics sessions - Register NOW for your FREE TRIAL and allow Elite Sports Academy to open the doors of exciting opportunities for your child’s sporting journey! 


The cooler weather brings with it a fresh sense of motivation and curiosity, making it an ideal time to get your sporting journey underway! The pleasant weather being perfect to come down to our top class venues, offering: -


  • Amazing pitches and facilities to play football under the setting sun with our Football Programme!
  • Fantastic courts and coaches to prove Ball Is Life and Shoot Your Shot with our Basketball Programme!
  • Fully equipped studios to align your mind and body with our Gymnastics Programme!
  • And just the perfect time to dip your toes in and join our Swimming Programme!


With select DISCOUNTS still on offer - now is the best time to sign up! We still offer our Pro-Rata/Semi-Annual Discount, as well as our year-round 10% Sibling Discount! We also offer our Multiple-Session Discount if you sign up for more than one session a week or multiple sports/disciplines! 


Our sessions are extremely well thought out and planned by our team of highly experienced & qualified coaches, where we offer the perfect solution for you, and for every level. So why not explore a new hobby if you are new to the sport, embrace a challenging project and better yourself, or dive in and join our programmes with coaches that will take your child to the next level?


The possibilities are endless, and your learning journey is perfectly placed to be infused with some Elite Power! #BeElite

 

Register today and let the season of possibilities begin!

node.title: Term 2 Registration is NOW OPEN
node.content:
⚽️


After an amazing start to the season, and with Term 1 behind us, we are delighted to be taking registrations for Term 2, commencing after the winter break, from Tuesday 2nd January 2024.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Our FOOTBALL ⚽️, SWIMMING ‍♂️, GYMNASTICS & BASKETBALL sessions are available across Dubai and Abu Dhabi, for children of all aged 2 – 17 years of age.


With the weather now perfect, there is no better time to get enrolled in one of our sessions, so via: -


www.elitesports.ae

enquiry@elitesports.ae

04 554 5916
